channel.title: 525 ip changer clients(NO ONE HAS EVER HELPED ME WITH THIS PROBLEM!)
channel.description:
When i run the client it connects to my local host which is 127.0.0.1 obviously. But it gives me this error and my server is online but it gives me the following error:
[QUOTE] Connecting to the Server.. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Applet_Sub1 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknow n Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at client2.<init>(client2.java:118) at client2.main(client2.java:31) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Applet_Sub1 at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 14 more
OR I GET THIS ERROR IF I USE ANOTHER CLIENT:
error_game_js5connect[/QUOTE]
And it doesnt run please help me.... is it the client that has problems and should i download another one? Also if you want to know the server its W00tsc4p3 525
[b]PLEASE HELP ME NO ONE EVER HELPS ME PLEASE :'( IT GETS ME SO FRUSTRATED >=[[/b]

item.description:
@moparscape5399 wrote:

When i run the client it connects to my local host which is 127.0.0.1 obviously. But it gives me this error and my server is online but it gives me the following error:

[QUOTE]
Connecting to the Server…
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Applet_Sub1
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknow n Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at client2.(client2.java:118)
at client2.main(client2.java:31)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Applet_Sub1
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
… 14 more

OR I GET THIS ERROR IF I USE ANOTHER CLIENT:

error_game_js5connect[/QUOTE]

And it doesnt run please help me… is it the client that has problems and should i download another one? Also if you want to know the server its W00tsc4p3 525

                                       [b]PLEASE HELP ME NO ONE EVER HELPS ME PLEASE :'( IT GETS ME SO FRUSTRATED >=[[/b]
